U.S. Senator Jerry Moran and others attend the ceremonial launch of KU’s NSF Engineering Research Center (ERC) - Environmentally Applied Refrigerant Technology Hub (EARTH). The EARTH ERC is based at the KU School of Engineering and works to tackle climate change through the creation of a sustainable and circular refrigerant economy.
